score.description: App score since the launch of the app

reviews.description: App reviews since the launch of the app

ratings.description: App ratings since the launch of the app

ratings1.description: App ratings with 1 star since the launch of the app

ratings2.description: App ratings with 2 stars since the launch of the app

ratings3.description: App ratings with 3 stars since the launch of the app

ratings4.description: App ratings with 4 stars since the launch of the app

ratings5.description: App ratings with 5 stars since the launch of the app

currentVersionScore.description: App score for the current app version

currentVersionReviews.description: App reviews for the current app version

minInstalls.description: App minimum installs since the launch of the app

maxInstalls.description: App maximum installs since the launch of the app
